<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Single Workout Plan</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
    // Call the script include method to check Transactions table
    var hasTransaction = validateTransaction.checkTransactionsForCurrentUser();

    if (hasTransaction) {
        // Hide the catalog item
        g_form.setVisible(false);
        // Optionally, display a message explaining the restriction
        g_form.addInfoMessage('This item is not available to users with existing transactions.');
    }
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-12-03 13:11:13</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>e86b3c8b9736311070d034100153af40</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Single Workout Plan</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Gym Management" source="x_1117801_gym_mngt">5f9f328a976a311070d034100153af49</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Gym Management">5f9f328a976a311070d034100153af49</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_e86b3c8b9736311070d034100153af40</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-12-03 13:11:13</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
